Title: Persepolis
Actors: Chiara Mastroianni, Danielle Darrieux, Catherine Deneuve, Simon Abkarian
Plot: A precocious and outspoken Iranian girl grows up during the Islamic Revolution.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 30 wins & 58 nominations.
Production: Sofica Europacorp, 2.4.7. Films, Diaphana Films, Centre National de la Cinematographie, Fondation GAN pour le Cinéma, French Connection Animations, France 3 Cinéma, Région Ile-de-France, Kennedy/Marshall, Celluloid Dreams, Soficinéma 3, Procirep, Sony Pictures Classics
